description:
Company Description

FashionBeans is a leading digital media company that offers men's style advice and expertise in various aspects of good living. Our mission is to help men define and refine their personal style, providing inspiration with new trends and translating high-fashion into everyday looks.

Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for a Brand Partnerships Manager. The individual will be responsible for managing and building relationships with FashionBean's brand partners, creating bespoke impactful messaging and driving engagement across all FashionBeans' channels. The Brand Partnerships Manager will collaborate with editors, strategize, and conduct research in order to increase the brand's reach and awareness.

Qualifications
• Excellent analytical and communication skills
• Experience in partnerships, account management, and strategic partnerships
• Ability to conduct research and analyze data to inform partnership decisions
• Innovative mindset and ability to think creatively to develop impactful messaging
• Experience in digital media or fashion industry is a plus
• Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Communications, or related field
